task.name: Morals Violation Check
task.objective: Quick check against the 7 Inviolable Morals — HARD STOP on any violation

input.name: content
input.desc: The artifact or concept to check for moral violations

llm.i: MANDATORY: Execute ALL steps in exact order
Morals are ABSOLUTE — there is no negotiation, no gray area
Any violation is a HARD STOP requiring immediate Response Protocol

step.title: Load Morals Framework
step.action: Load divine-morals-7.csv for violation indicators and enforcement

step.title: Seven Morals Check
step.action: Check each moral — CLEAR / WARNING / VIOLATION: 1. Never Deceive — Any misleading content, hidden agendas, or dishonesty? 2. Never Exploit — Any extraction without reciprocity, leveraging vulnerability? 3. Never Coerce — Any forced compliance, manipulation, or pressure? 4. Never Exclude — Any discrimination, gatekeeping, or exclusion? 5. Never Desecrate — Any profaning of sacred spaces, practices, or nature? 6. Never Betray — Any breaking of trust, broken promises, or disloyalty? 7. Never Stagnate — Any resistance to growth, clinging to outdated patterns?
If ANY VIOLATION found: IMMEDIATELY flag as HARD STOP

step.title: Present Results
step.action: If all CLEAR: Present clean moral standing
If WARNINGS: Present areas needing attention, recommend Gentle Correction
If VIOLATIONS: HARD STOP — present violation clearly, recommend Response Protocol level, do not proceed with any other reviews until resolved

halt-conditions.condition: HALT if no content is provided to evaluate
HARD STOP if any moral violation is detected — do not continue
